verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shudda aathma digirammu ma pai vegame Shudhi Yesu nee eevula maakeeyumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pentekostanu naata digivachina Priya aathma digirammu ee velayandu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dappigonna athmalanu dappi theerchanu Thappaka okkokkarini sandhinchu vega{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}prematodane shudda paavurama ra Daasi mammu yuddamunaku siddaparachuma{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nidra kashtamula somaratvamun veedi stotrimpa Nutsahamunu maa pai poyuma{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gata kalamandu jayamichina yatti nootana praardhana Vaancha maalo poyumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prema deenatvamu shaantha samaadhanamul Santoshamu maalo vruddi pondajeyumaa{/lang-eng}
